standards.name: Hypermedia Security: Catalog Approval Requirements
standards.description: Human-in-the-loop approval requirements for catalog deployment to secured environments

requirements.title: Human Approval for Production
requirements.text: Catalog artifacts MUST receive explicit human approval before deployment to secured environments. Approval must be recorded with approver identity, timestamp, and target environment.
descriptions: Human approval provides governance and oversight for production deployments. Approvers verify that automated checks passed and exercise judgment about deployment timing and risk.

requirements.title: Approval Audit Trail
requirements.text: All approvals MUST be recorded with approver identity, email, timestamp, and justification. This audit trail must be cryptographically signed and remain accessible.
descriptions: Approval audit trails enable compliance verification and incident investigation. Recording approver identity creates accountability.
